name: ConvertX
short_description: Self-hosted file conversion tool supporting multiple formats.
description: Self-hosted file conversion tool supporting multiple formats. ConvertX is a self-hosted application focused on tools, utility, storage, files. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose. It supports a wide range of use cases for homelabs and self-hosted infrastructure.
usecases: Self-host ConvertX on your home server to self-hosted file conversion tool supporting multiple formats without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use ConvertX to manage your tools workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
